checksumcalculator.cc

00001 #include "checksumcalculator.hh"
00002 #include <vector>
00003 
00004 char* checksumcalculator(LCObject* obj){
00005 
00006   MD5 md5;
00007 
00008   EVENT::LCGenericObject *generic_object=dynamic_cast<LCGenericObject *>(obj);
00009   if (!generic_object) {
00010     throw std::runtime_error( "ERROR:Checksum can only be calculated for LCGenericObjects" );
00011   }
00012 
00013 
00014 
00015   //calculate checksum for integer values in this object
00016   if(generic_object->getNInt() > 0) {
00017     vector<int> intvals;
00018     intvals.resize(generic_object->getNInt());
00019     //cout << "Number of Integers in Generic Object: " << generic_object->getNInt() << endl;
00020 
00021     for (int iint = 0; iint < generic_object->getNInt(); iint++) {
00022       intvals[iint] = generic_object->getIntVal(iint);
00023     }
00024     md5.update(reinterpret_cast<unsigned char *>( &(intvals[0] ) ), sizeof(int)/sizeof(char)
00025                 * generic_object->getNInt()); 
00026 
00027   }
00028 
00029 
00030   //calculate checksum for float values in this object
00031   if(generic_object->getNFloat() > 0) {
00032     vector<float> floatvals;
00033     floatvals.resize(generic_object->getNFloat());
00034     //cout << "Number of Floats in Generic Object: " << generic_object->getNFloat() << endl;
00035 
00036     for (int ifloat = 0; ifloat < generic_object->getNFloat(); ifloat++) {
00037       floatvals[ifloat] = generic_object->getFloatVal(ifloat);
00038     }
00039     md5.update(reinterpret_cast<unsigned char *>(&floatvals[0]), sizeof(float)/sizeof(char)
00040                 * generic_object->getNFloat()); 
00041 
00042   }
00043 
00044 
00045   //calculate checksum for double values in this object
00046   if(generic_object->getNDouble() > 0) {
00047     vector<double> doublevals;
00048     doublevals.resize(generic_object->getNFloat());
00049     //cout << "Number of Doubles in Generic Object: " << generic_object->getNDouble() << endl;
00050     
00051     for (int idouble = 0; idouble < generic_object->getNDouble(); idouble++) {
00052       doublevals[idouble] = generic_object->getDoubleVal(idouble);
00053     }
00054     md5.update(reinterpret_cast<unsigned char *>( &doublevals[0] ), sizeof(double)/sizeof(char)
00055                * generic_object->getNFloat()); 
00056     
00057   }
00058 
00059 
00060   md5.finalize();
00061   return md5.hex_digest();
00062 
00063 }
